Ising Constants¶

This module contains the Boltzmann constant and a wrapper for the actual plotting function.

ising.constants.BOLTZMANN_K¶

The Boltzmann constant in Joules per Kelvin.

Type

float

Value

1.38064852e-23

Canonical

ising.constants.BOLTZMANN_K
